column1: For World Tree Day, Snook gives out badges to everyone who is nice to the tree, but Bob can't think of what to do -until he comes up with a song.Also: Madge and Snook plan a party to celebrate the World Tree's birthday.
Bob investigates a shiny green object that fell from the sky, and, with Madge's help, figures out what it is. Also: Winslow fears that everyone else is smarter than he is.
Bob fears that Ick is stuck inside a rock, but soon learns that the rock is a fossil
column2: Smooch and Snook help patch Burdette's nest.

column1: After Winslow injures his arm, he refuses to slow down and winds up hurting his leg too.Also: Burdette is upset when the nuts on her favorite tree disappear.

column2: Madge and Snook think about everything that's occurred at the World Tree during the past year.

column1: Winslow, Smooch and Snook organize a relay race  for all the animals of the World Tree.Also: Wartz wonders if fish and plants are related since they both need water to survive.",high15143.txt
